name: Rose (Purple Clam)
description:
[CONTROLS]

-Move: Arrow keys ⇦ ⇨

-Jump: Up arrow key ⇧

-Go down platform:  Down arrow key ⇩

-Melee attack: X

-Range attack: C

-Skip cutscene: Spacebar

-Restart: R

Here is my entry for the 2022 LowRez game jam! It was made in two weeks with the goal of making the game with a resolution under  64x64. Thanks to my friends who helped playtest the game during development. Have fun and please let me know what you think :D
